front.title: Registration for enumservices of group messages

abstract.t: This document registers a group of 'enumservices' [5] to be used to indicate that the associated resources are capable of receiving discrete messages. Specifically, the 'enumservices' registered with this document are 'email', 'fax', 'sms', 'ems' and 'mms' using the URI schemes 'mailto:' and 'tel:'
